snippet: A South Korean weight lifter has heard his national anthem played after winning gold in an international competition in Pyongyang, North Korea.
abstract: Two South Koreans in the junior competition at the Asian Cup and Interclub Weightlifting Championship in Pyongyang, North Korea, are the only competitors in the 85-kilogram weight category and win gold and silver; North Korean crowd stands as the South Korean anthem plays; Seoul says it was first time its athletes have attended an international sports event in North.
lead_paragraph: A South Korean weight lifter has heard his national anthem played after winning gold in an international competition in Pyongyang, North Korea.

headline.main: South Korean Wins Gold in North Korean Capital
headline.print_headline: South Korean Wins Gold In North Korean Capital
